product_name: Sea to Summit Folding Bucket - 20 Liters
long_description: Easily transport up to 20 liters of water back to your campsite with the lightweight and packable Sea To Summit Folding Bucket. Bucket packs down small and weighs only 3.9 oz. so you can easily take it on backpacking trips. Made from nonabsorbent, food grade thermoplastic urethane-coated nylon. 420-denier bottom panel resists abrasion and provides a stable base on level surfaces. Dual-layer, 420-denier nylon handle is welded to the main body; grab handle located on the base makes for easy pouring.
short_description: Easily transport up to 20 liters of water back to your campsite with the lightweight and packable Sea To Summit Folding Bucket.
